#include<stdio.h>
#include<math.h>
int main()
{
int x,y,i,j,n;
char str[100];
long double fact=1.0,fact2=1.0;
scanf("%d%d",&x,&y);
	if(x>y)
	{n=x;j=y;}
	else {n=y;j=x;}
	for(i=(x+y);i>n;i--,j--)
	{fact=(fact*i);fact2=fact2*j;}
	
	sprintf(str,"%Lf",fact*1.0/fact2);
	for(i=0;str[i]!='.';i++)
	printf("%c",str[i]);
	printf("\n");
	return(0);
}
